abstract: In a new video, Rick Perry attacks Mitt Romney as both the inspiration for President Obama's health care reform and a flip-flopper who shouldn't be considered for the White House.
snippet: In a new video, Rick Perry attacks Mitt Romney as both the inspiration for President Obama's health care reform and a flip-flopper who shouldn't be considered for the White House.
lead_paragraph: In a striking new video, Rick Perry attacks Mitt Romney as both the inspiration for President Obama's health care reform and a repeated flip-flopper who shouldn't be considered for the White House.

headline.main: Perry Video Attacks Romney on Health Care
